gamelogic

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the hero.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hero()
      Creates an empty hero.
      Hero(char[][] grid)
      Creates a hero from the given grid.
      Hero(Maze maze)
      Creates a hero with random coordinates and places it on the given maze.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Makes the hero fight the dragon.

      Return the hero's position on the maze.

      Returns the symbol of hero.

      Returns the x-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.

      Returns the y-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero()
        Creates an empty hero.

      • Hero

        public Hero(char[][] grid)
        Creates a hero from the given grid.

        Checks the grid for the position of the hero creates the hero accordingly.

        Makes x and y to -1 if not found.

        Parameters:
        grid - grid to create the hero from

      • Hero

        public Hero(Maze maze)
        Creates a hero with random coordinates and places it on the given maze.

        The allowed coordinates are limited by the maze given.

        Parameters:
        maze - the maze it which to insert the hero

    • Method Detail

      • fightDragon

        public int fightDragon(Dragon dragon)
        Makes the hero fight the dragon.
        Parameters:
        dragon - dragon to fight
        Returns:
        0 if hero and dragon aren't adjacent or if the dragon is asleep. 1 if the hero is unarmed. 2 if the hero is armed.

      • getHeroPosition

        public Point getHeroPosition()
        Return the hero's position on the maze.
        Returns:
        Point with the coordinates of the hero

      • getSymbol

        public char getSymbol()
        Returns the symbol of hero.
        Returns:
        symbol

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns the x-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.
        Returns:
        x-coordinate

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns the y-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.
        Returns:
        y-coordinate

      • move

        public boolean move(java.lang.String key,
                    Maze maze)
        Moves the hero within the maze.
        Parameters:
        key - where the hero is supposed to move
        maze - maze the hero is in
        Returns:
        true if hero is moved. false if not.

      • pickUpSword

        public boolean pickUpSword(Maze.Sword sword,
                           Maze maze)
        Makes the hero pick up the sword
        Parameters:
        sword - the sword on the maze
        maze - maze
        Returns:
        true if the hero is on the sword. false if otherwise.

      • setSymbol

        public void setSymbol(char symbol)
        Sets the symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol to set

        public void setX(int x)
        Sets the x-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate

      • setY

        public void setY(int y)
        Sets the y-coordinate of the hero on the maze grid.
        Parameters:
        y - y-coordinate
